strapiPost.title: Software Developer Metova Moving Headquarters To Ledger In Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
The community forming at Ledger gained a new neighbor as software development company Metova relocates its headquarters from Franklin, TN, to Bentonville after a change in ownership.

  • New horizons: Having been recently acquired from a private equity firm by the current management team, Metova is focused on providing software solutions in industries like healthcare, retail, consumer services, and entertainment.
  • Community add: The move to Bentonville will establish Metova as a leading company in Arkansas's growing tech industry and position it to partner well with local businesses and the Northwest Arkansas community.
